properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A charming four-bedroom detached house with a spacious garden, perfect for a growing family. Situated in a peaceful neighborhood, the property offers easy access to local schools, parks, and essential amenities. Inside, the house features two reception rooms, a modern fitted kitchen, and a separate dining area. The master bedroom comes with an en-suite bathroom, while the other three bedrooms share a well-maintained family bathroom. Additional highlights include off-road parking, a garage, and a patio area in the garden, ideal for outdoor entertainment.

This spacious three-bedroom flat is situated in a central location, making it ideal for commuters with its excellent transport links. Recently refurbished, the property boasts a modern finish throughout, with well-lit and airy living spaces that combine style and comfort. The flat features two contemporary bathrooms, a sleek kitchen with high-quality appliances, and an open-plan layout designed for modern living. Its proximity to local amenities, schools, and green spaces adds to its appeal, making it perfect for professionals or families looking for a convenient and stylish home.

Nestled in a highly sought-after area, this stunning six-bedroom house offers an exceptional blend of space and elegance. Perfect for large families, the property includes three bathrooms, expansive gardens, and a versatile layout that caters to modern living. The desirable location provides easy access to the city while being surrounded by a tranquil environment. This freehold property boasts bright, airy interiors with premium finishes, a generously sized kitchen, and ample storage throughout. Its close proximity to schools, parks, and shopping facilities ensures convenience and a high standard of living.

This charming four-bedroom detached house is located in a peaceful neighborhood, making it an ideal choice for a growing family. The property features a large, well-maintained garden and two modern bathrooms, perfect for entertaining or enjoying quiet evenings at home. The interior includes spacious bedrooms with built-in storage, a bright living area, and a family-friendly kitchen. Located within easy reach of local schools, parks, and amenities, this freehold home combines comfort, convenience, and community charm.

A masterpiece of modern living, this five-bedroom detached house boasts premium finishes and an open-plan design perfect for both relaxation and entertainment. The property includes four luxurious bathrooms, a large kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, and a home office ideal for remote work. Outside, a landscaped garden provides a serene retreat for outdoor activities. Located in the prestigious Woodland Drive, this freehold home offers a blend of sophistication and practicality, with excellent transport links and access to top-rated schools, making it an excellent choice for families or professionals.
